alert.note: Alert for Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:03PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Polk County through 545 PM CDT... At 503 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms extending from 8 miles northwest of Wickes to near Vandervoort. These storms were moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wickes... Vandervoort... Cossatot River State Park... Hartley... Mccauley... Cove... Hatton... Bogg Springs... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations
